articles.title: Congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il from C.C., NDFSK
Anniversary of WPK observed
Evening galas of youth and students held
Promising Taekwon-do player
Office and library of Nepalese youth society opened
Kim Yong Chun meets new Russian ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Chun meets new Russian ambassador 
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Chun, chief of the general staff of the Korean People's Army, met and had a talk with newly appointed Russian ambassador e.p. to the DPRK Andrei Karlov who paid a courtesy call on him today.
 Present there were generals and officers of the KPA and the military attache of the Russian embassy here.

articles.title: SPA chairman meets new Mongolian ambassador
articles.content:
SPA chairman meets new Mongolian ambassador 
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Janchivdorjyn Lombo, new Mongolian ambassador e.p. to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

articles.title: Kim Ki Nam meets Finnish party delegation
articles.content:
Kim Ki Nam meets Finnish party delegation 
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Peace and Socialism-the Communist Workers' Party of Finland headed by its vice-chairman Reijo Katajaranta at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 The head of the delegation said that he was very happy to visit Korea and Korean socialism is sure to emerge victorious.    
 He noted that he would do his best for friendship between his party and the WPK and between the peoples of Finland and Korea.
